description: Global DJ Broadcast is the weekly radio show hosted by international DJ and producer Markus Schulz. Receiving multiple IDMA nominations since its inception, Markus’ unique fusion of trance, progressive and multiple additional genres has contributed to becoming one of the most popular radio shows on FM, satellite and online. Bringing the best from Coldharbour Recordings and beyond, Global DJ Broadcast is the home of the freshest and biggest tunes, including the monthly World Tour series, and specialist themed concepts such as the Classics Showcase, the Sunrise Set and Afterdark.
title: Markus Schulz Presents Global DJ Broadcast

episodes.title: Global DJ Broadcast: Marksu Schulz and Daxson (Nov 12 2020)
episodes.description:
In between Escape Tour stops, this week's Global DJ Broadcast sees Markus celebrating the imminent release of his new single Tidal Wave alongside HALIEENE, by premiering the KhoMha remix, and inviting Daxson to premiere his own remix in his guestmix. The show also features new music from Ben McConnell, Above & Beyond, Eric Prydz, Pretty Pink, Marco V and more.

 

Next week will be episode 4 of the audiovisual Escape Tour, with Markus' set emanating live from Black Rock City; the home of Burning Man. Hope you enjoy the show, and you will check out the new Escape album, as well as watch the Escape to Angels Window performance on YouTube. Escape is out now on all digital and streaming platforms, and available on CD at the Black Hole shop.

episodes.title: Markus Schulz - Global DJ Broadcast Afterdark 2020 (4 Hour All-Rabbithole Set)
episodes.description:
A very special edition of the Global DJ Broadcast for you this week, as Markus Schulz presents the next installment of our four seasons series - and on this occasion, celebrating the weird and wonderful of the rabbithole through the sixth annual Global DJ Broadcast Afterdark. However, with many people around the world entering another period of lockdown, Markus has striven for the community further by creating a specially extended 4 hour edition of the themed mix this year.

 

Hope you will enjoy this special set and will download to keep in your collection. Markus' special audiovisual tour returns next week, showcasing his sounds live from the Grand Canyon as we Escape to Angel's Window. Until then, continue to stay safe and well.

episodes.title: Global DJ Broadcast: Markus Schulz and Nifra (Oct 22 2020)
episodes.description:
Following Escape to To'hajiilee, Markus Schulz returns to studio duty on Global DJ Broadcast this week, to catch up and showcase the latest big tunes. The mix includes new music from Joyhauser, Above & Beyond, Ferry Corsten, Kolonie and Fonzerelli among others, and in the second hour, he is joined by Nifra to help celebrate the release of her new mix compilation, Follow Me 2.

 

Next week will be a very special episode, one of the most anticipated of the year - the annual Global DJ Broadcast Afterdark - specially extended for 2020. 

 

Hope you enjoy the show, and you will check out the the Escape to To'hajiilee and Escape to Sedona performances on YouTube. You are also welcome to check out the newly released Destinations 10, an uplifting and uptempo journey, on Spotify.

episodes.title: Markus Schulz - Escape to To'Hajiilee
episodes.description:
Following the breathtaking sights and sounds of Markus Schulz's opening Escape tour performance at Sedona in Arizona, the theme of stunning landscapes continues into episode 2; emanating from the Indian reservation grounds of To'hajiilee in New Mexico. With scenery made famous by acclaimed television series Breaking Bad and Better Call Saul, we gather together virtually for an audiovisual Escape to To'hajiilee. The second hour is his studio companion Road to To'Hajiilee mix, which contains a couple of world premieres from Coldharbour.

 

Next week, Markus will be joined by Nifra on the guestmix, celebrating the release of her new compilation, Follow Me 2. And in two weeks, one of the most anticipated episodes of the year - the annual Global DJ Broadcast Afterdark.

 

Hope you enjoy the show, and you will check out the new Escape album, as well as watch the Escape to To'hajiilee performance on YouTube. Escape is out now on all digital and streaming platforms, and available on CD at the Black Hole shop.

episodes.title: Global DJ Broadcast: Markus Schulz and Rodg (Oct 08 2020)
episodes.description:
Following the Escape Tour launch last week, Markus Schulz resumes regular studio duties on the Global DJ Broadcast this week. He features Coldharbour world premieres from Arkham Knights, Nifra & Fisherman and Copini; as well as new music from Spencer Brown & ALPHA 9, Christian Burns, Ilan Bluestone, Cristoph and more. In the second hour, Markus is joined by Rodg for the guestmix, celebrating the release of his new artist album Evocations.

 

Next week, the Escape Tour will resume, with Markus' audiovisual performance live from the To'hajiilee desert in New Mexico. 

 

Hope you enjoy the show, and you will check out the new Escape album, as well as watch the Escape to Sedona performance on YouTube. Escape is out now on all digital and streaming platforms, and available on CD at the Black Hole shop.

episodes.title: Markus Schulz - Escape to Sedona
episodes.description:
Celebrating the release of his new artist album Escape, and striving to connect with all of you during uncertain and unprecedented times, Markus Schulz will showcase ten special audiovisual presentations; as the Escape Tour lives through virtual means. The first edition emanates from his old stomping arounds in Arizona, taking in the breathtakingly beautiful scenery of Sedona.

 

Following the one hour live performance, the second hour is a companion Road to Sedona mix, with tracks which have inspired Markus when driving to the various destinations for the tour. 

 

Hope you enjoy the show, and you will check out the new Escape album to hear Markus in musical dimensions like never before. It is out now on all digital and streaming platforms, and available on CD at the Black Hole shop.

episodes.title: Global DJ Broadcast: Markus Schulz Escape Album Special (Sep 24 2020)
episodes.description:
The wait is over, and Markus Schulz's brand new artist album Escape has arrived. He dedicates this week's Global DJ Broadcast to its release, showcasing several world premieres from the album working alongside the likes of HALIENE, Christian Burns, SINGA, JES, Christina Novelli and more. In the second hour, he showcases a brand new Claus Backslash track coming to Coldharbour, a new remix of HALIENE's single Walk Through Walls, along with plenty of favorites from Coldharbour and beyond. 

 

Hope you enjoy the mix, and you will check out the new Escape album to hear Markus in musical dimensions like never before. It is out now on all digital and streaming platforms, and available on CD at the Black Hole shop.

episodes.title: Global DJ Broadcast: Markus Schulz 2 Hour Mix (Sep 17 2020)
episodes.description:
As the Escape tour continues across western United States, Markus Schulz takes the opportunity to check in with one of his traditional two hour studio journeys; spanning across trance, progressive and techno. The show features new music by Oliver Smith, Dennis Sheperd, Tritonal, Above & Beyond, Maceo Plex and more.

 

With Markus' brand new artist album Escape arriving on Friday September 25, he will present a special album release special on the broadcast next week, with lots of world premieres from Escape and more. 

 

Hope you enjoy the show, and continue to stay safe. Hope you will check out the release of Feel Alive, along with In Search of Sunrise 16, and the newly released episode 9 of Destinations; an end of summer themed edition.

He also provides In Search of Sunrise 16 showcases from DJ T.H. & Jan Johnston and Dave Neven, as well as new music from Cosmic Gate & Andrew Bayer, i_o, Giuseppe Ottaviani and Solarstone among others. In the second hour, he is joined by Mike EFEX for the guestmix, whose ISOS 16 featured Midnight Colours receives its full release this weekend.

episodes.title: Global DJ Broadcast: Markus Schulz World Tour Miami (Sep 03 2020)
episodes.description:
The World Tour returns on Global DJ Broadcast and with the clubs remaining closed, Markus Schulz opens the archives to relive another special night. With Labor Day weekend approaching, he would normally be playing for his hometown fans in Miami; and it prompted him to showcase two hours of a particular open to close solo set which had never been aired before. The night in question is the closing party for 2017's Miami Music Week, where Markus played for 10 hours. 

 

Hope you enjoy the show, and continue to stay safe. You are also welcome to check out the newly released In Search of Sunrise 16 compilation, as well as the new edition of Markus' monthly mix series Destinations, with episode 9 available on Spotify from Friday.

episodes.title: Global DJ Broadcast; Markus Schulz and Johan Gielen (Aug 13 2020)
episodes.description:
It has been an emotional week for Markus Schulz - with the joy of being part of the newly released In Search of Sunrise 16 compilation, mixed with the sadness of losing a friend in legendary trance figure Dimitri de Wit. The show is dedicated to his memory, and includes several ISOS 16 showcases, along with a world premiere of In Search of Sunrise remixed by NOMADsignal. Johan Gielen joins for the guestmix in the second hour, also showcasing his own ISOS work with Balearic Reflection.

 

Hope you enjoy the set, and if you haven't yet, you are welcome to check out In Search of Sunrise 16, available now on all download and streaming platforms, as well on CD at MagikMuzik.shop. Markus' monthly Destinations series also returns this weekend, with episode 8 dropping on Spotify this Friday.

episodes.title: Markus Schulz - 4 Hour Set for Coldharbour Day 2020
episodes.description: The summer season means two special and important gifts for the community each year - the Sunrnise Set, and an exclusive four hour journey for the annual Coldharbour Day celebrations. Starting off deep and building it up, and touching the soul all the way; with a sprinkling of current, recent and distant memories. Hope you enjoy and download to keep in your collection, available by subscribing for free at markusschulzpodcast.com

episodes.title: Global DJ Broadcast: Markus Schulz and Sunlounger (Jul 30 2020)
episodes.description:
On the eve of Coldharbour Day, Markus Schulz checks in with another plentiful selection of big tunes for the summer season in the latest Global DJ Broadcast.

 

He includes a Coldharbour Black world premiere from Saad Ayub & Daniel Ortgiess, as well as showcasing new music from Daxson, Davey Asprey, Dave Neven, ALPHA 9, Yotto and more. In the second hour, he is joined by Roger Shah, providing a guestmix under his Sunlounger alias, as a prelude to his contribution alongside Markus and Giuseppe Ottaviani for In Search of Sunrise 16, available from August 7. 

 

But before that, this Friday is a very special day. As well as the release of Markus & Adina Butar's In Search of Sunrise single, it is also our annual Coldharbour Day celebrations - a mammoth 34 hour video and audio broadcast taking place at coldharbour.tv. Markus will be contributing an exclusive 4 hour journey for that, and will make it available as a download through this podcast feed. So hope you will be ready for that.

 

Until then, enjoy the latest Global DJ Broadcast.

It is a big period coming up, including the annual Coldharbour Day radio marathon taking place on Friday July 31, which will include an exlusive 4 hour set from Markus. episodes.title: Global DJ Broadcast: Markus Schulz In Bloom 2020 (3 Hour All-Vocal Trance Mix)
episodes.description:
Those of you who regularly follow Global DJ Broadcast will know that in recent years, I've introduced the Four Seasons series; which consists of one special mix during each quarter of the calendar, based on a particular theme. I always looked forward to the spring, where the flowers would blossom and make what we see more colorful. Marrying that idea with the bind of artist and vocalist led to the creation of the annual In Bloom mix.

 

My wish is that when we get out on the other side of this pandemic, we'll be able to go on those walks and take in the scenery around us. So as a way of saying thanks to you all again, on top of Community in Isolation and the live streams from the balcony, this year's In Bloom for the first time is a specially extended 3 hour edition - with loads of your favorite vocal tracks mainly across trance, but also a little bit of progressive and deep house too. And of course, a couple of cherished classics thrown in.

 

I hope that it is something you will download to keep in your collection forever. Enjoy the journey.

 

With love,

Markus

episodes.title: Global DJ Broadcast: Markus Schulz Community in Isolation 4 Hour Mix
episodes.description:
Hello from home in Miami. To say that I am so glad to be able to check in with a Global DJ Broadcast episode, playing music for you, would be an understatement. It doesn't matter who you are or where you are, we are all either quarantined, self-isolated and practicing social distancing. With anxiety high and so much uncertainty thanks to the coronavirus pandemic, music is an escape for every one of us.

 

I've always thought of this radio show in particular as playing for our entire family of fans - a bond mainly shared in an online world, and music is an inspiration and a healer in times where we have to be alone. Many of you sent emails and messages across social media asking if I could contribute something special. And the answer is yes.

 

So for this week, I put together a specially extended 4 hour edition of GDJB, titled Community in Isolation. It contains lots of current and recent favorites across trance, progressive and techno, with some mashups and distant classics thrown in too.

 

My hope is that in doing this for you, it provides the chance to just close out the outside noise and escape for a while, uniting in the sounds. Let's drown out the outside sound and take this journey together.

 

With love,

Markus

episodes.title: Global DJ Broadcast: Markus Schulz World Tour London (Feb 06 2020)
episodes.description:
We've reached that time of the month again to vacate the Global DJ Broadcast studio and take you all out on the road for company, chronicling Markus Schulz's recent travels and the sounds of his liveset performances through the World Tour. From the bright lights of Las Vegas, he heads across to Europe and touch down in one of our favorite cities, and one that he briefly called home.

 

When you think of the UK clubbing scene, the name of Ministry of Sound immediately comes to prominence. And Markus was fortunate again to pay tribute to this DJ art we love by playing another open to close solo set at the venue. Highlights from the night form this week's Global DJ Broadcast.

 

In the clubs this weekend, you can find Markus playing another open to close solo set at ASeven in Berlin, before returning to Bucharest to play at Kristal Club on Saturday. Friday is also a big release day, with Markus' new single with Adina Butar, titled Indestructible, available on all streaming platforms; and the second episode of the monthly GDJB companion mix, Destinations, will also be available to stream on Spotify.

 

So hope you enjoy all of that, and of course the latest GDJB podcast.

episodes.title: Global DJ Broadcast: Markus Schulz 2 Hour Mix (Jan 30 2020)
episodes.description:
Ahead of another legacy night for Markus Schulz at the famed Ministry of Sound nightclub, he finds himself in London this week, and checks in with another of his signature 2 hour studio Global DJ Broadcast journeys.

 

The show begins in sombre fashion, with a memorial tribute to Kobe Bryant, and the action picks up with the world premiere of Markus' brand new single alongside Adina Butar, titled Indestructible. Accompanied with Coldharbour premieres from Arkham Knights and Purple Stories, along with big new tunes from BT, Boris Brejcha, Tom Fall, Fehrplay, ANNA and more, there is plenty in store across his 2 hour blend of trance, progressive and techno.

 

In the clubs this weekend, you can find Markus playing open to close at Ministry of Sound in London on Friday, which will feature on next week's World Tour, and at the Marrakech Gianpula Village in Malta on Saturday.

 

But until then, enjoy your weekend, and hope you enjoy the latest podcast.

episodes.title: Global DJ Broadcast: Markus Schulz Classics Showcase 2020
episodes.description:
Hello again. Another Christmas and New Year gift made and dedicated to you.

 

A project that was a year-long labor of love and completed during the holiday is proudly here to be presented - the annual Global DJ Broadcast Classics Showcase, part of the Four Seasons series.

 

Since an early age, one of the biggest loves and passions in my life has been the radio. In particular, I was so moved by the period between Christmas and New Year, when suddenly what day of the week it is didn't feel important, and this was reflected with all the stations playing classic songs.

 

My goal was to take this inspiration towards my own radio show, and the Classics Showcase has grown to become one of the most emotionally resonating and powerful episodes for fans each year, whether current, long-standing or lapsed.

 

And with the 2020 edition joining the ranks of several previous ones, marking the 15th Classics Showcase in total, I hope that it's just as memorable as those before, with many championed trance, progressive and techno tunes of our era, and also hidden gems which perhaps did not receive the recognition they deserved at the time.

 

I would like to wish you all a very Happy New Year, and thank you for continuing to believe in everything I do.

 

With love,

Markus x
